extendedInfo.description: Volume Control+ Pro is improved version of Volume Control+ with additional features and Ad-freeVolume Control+ is a volume control app that support changing control types and colors. FeaturesThree kinds of control types- Volume dial : Feeling of analog device  Buttons : Precise control  Seek bars(sliders) : Quick and easy  â» If you want to know the total volume in dial     control mode, turn your device into horizontalVolume control- Media, Ring, Notifications, In-call, alarm, systemMute and unmuteVibratemode setting(ring and notification)Change ringermodes- Normal, Vibrate, SilentChange colors- Red, Blue, Green, Violet, Vanilla, Ice blue, StrawberrySystem settings- Change ringtone- Use incoming call volume for notifications Preset(Profile)- You can make a volume preset(profile) for frequently used settings, and by using app for preset(It is available with the Pro version) can be applied quicklyHomescreen widgetLock volume- 'Lock volume' prevent unwanted changing volume and    ringermode   (The volume will be fixed in locked state, but this   application can control the volume in lock state) â» Screen is optimized for smartphones. In tablet pc, screen may not be correct.

reviews.title: A True \"Must-Have\" App!
reviews.comment: There are few must-have apps for Android and Volume Control is definitely one of them.  Bought the pay version to get rid of the ads and to support this great dev.  Zero issues with the paid version.  Just loving this app anew!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it, so handy, quick and easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This developer isn\'t supporting their app!
reviews.comment: I\'m a user of the SPH-D710 and when I purchased the app it advertised separate controls for my Bluetooth  headset because the Android OS doesn\'t do this natively . I found out after the 15 minute refund period that it doesn\'t control the notification volume separately from the at all even if I mute everything but the \"Media\" and \"Voice Call\". My main problem is that they won\'t acknowledge me at all. Not even that they received my email and would get back to me soon. I have reached out to the calmly 4 times and gave them every chance to make things right or tell me that they are aware of it or that it\'s on their list of bug fixes but I haven\'t heard a peep. If you want to pay for GUI to control your volume just like your OS does for free then this app is for you but if I were you I would stay away from any app developer that won\'t stand behind something that they sale.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ringer and System bad..
reviews.comment: The biggest con with this is that if you adjust the ringer volume up the system that raises.  If you lower the system volume then the ringer lowers before, it was too independent sliders. There is no being able to text or flip through apps without everybody in the office hearing it.
reviews.author: John A Paolozzi Jr

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Since JB update, presets do not save, and volume settings must be adjusted manually.  Worked great before, but needs a fix to this problem before it is really useful again.  Disappointing.
reviews.author: David Cole

reviews.title: Phil
reviews.comment: Good app, and right idea. Scheduler still buggy after last fixes. Please correct it guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scheduler CRASHES!
reviews.comment: The sheduler crashes can\'t use it, HTCG2 icecream.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Presets not working right after Jelly Bean update
reviews.comment: After upgrading my phone to Jelly Bean, the presets don\'t apply setting correctly. I verify that settings are saved in a preset, but after I apply the preset not all correct options are set. Or, I save settings, go back to edit them, and they saved wrong.
reviews.author: Leo Perskii

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: Must have app, particularly now that android has decoupled notification and ringtone volumes. The widget is a one button solution for muting the phone for work. My biggest complaint is that there isnt an easy button to jump between volume and preset windows
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great until ICS
reviews.comment: Force closes ALL the time. Can\'t do anything, literally anything without FC on htc sensation.And ABSOLUTELY NO develop feedback.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work well
reviews.comment: I have a droid RAZR Max and this app keeps malfunction.
reviews.author: James Whitman

reviews.title: Best !
reviews.comment: Been using this on all my android devices ! Don\'t know why its not stock android to begin with ! But this app perfectly picks up where j.b lacks ! May I suggest adding preset accessibility or volume slider in the notification shade ? This will be so perfect on phones !! Thus it gives your app so much better functionality and versatility as we don\'t have to go out of what we\'re doing ! Please please please
reviews.author: KAY ZEE

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Love this handy little widget!  Lets me easily and quickly manage my phone volumes.  Nice app!
reviews.author: Aaron Chubb

reviews.title: Does what I want, so worth the money
reviews.comment: I tried the free version as I was fed up with the volume control on my Desire S getting knocked when its in my pocket. This app solved the problem and makes changing to silent easier so I upgraded to this version. Will try out some of the other features now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Bought this so that I could mute all sounds eith one touch but although I have a silent preset set up and saved when I switch to it the media volume is not muted. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Samantha Eason

reviews.title: Works good. Battery hog though
reviews.comment: When in volume locker mode (which is why I use it), consumes >24% of my battery. WAY too much for a phone that barely makes it 10-12 hours. I still have it, but I disabled it.
reviews.author: Mark R

reviews.title: The best volume app
reviews.comment: Its loud and I love it better then all the rest
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working well with ICS.
reviews.comment: You can unlink ringer and notification volumes in settings. I wish it didn\'t chirp when pressing the silent button. It no longer works well after update to ICS on Bionic. Developer is unresponsive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: well....
reviews.comment: my rating was 5, but after a whole day it got buggy....just like some ppl said in the free version and this one it has a mind of its own. The mute or volume down turns itself back on for no reason. Not good when I was at work. All day it would ring, wouldnt ring, ....way too many bugs they need to fix and they will not even bother to get back to you on email. I said what the problem was...nothing. Asked for refund....NOTHING. I do not recomend this and save a buck!!!! Wait till there are no more 1 stars for a while. If they fix it, I would give it 5 stars and be more than happy to give them a dollar...oh, I already did lol, but no fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on Galaxy S2 & S3
reviews.comment: Started crashing after an app update a few months back. Crashes when setting up scheduling. Just tried it for the first time on my new S3 and was disappointed to have it crash this phone also. Bummer.
reviews.author: A Google User
